# Requirement Parsing Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/requirement-parsing.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/requirement-parsing.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Parse and structure requirements from PRD and user stories
- **Used By**: Analyst
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
